CustomField.formula:
AND( OR( Blended_Discount__c > Approved_Discount__c, AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Blended_Discount__c)), ISBLANK(Approved_Discount__c) ) ), Associated_Opportunity_Type__c = 'Revenue Opportunity', SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.RecordType.Id = '0121a000000VnAB', SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Account.RecordType.Id != '0121a000000VnIa', NOT(CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name , 'IND ENT AE NA'))
)
CustomField.label: Entry Criteria Met for Ind. Disc. Blend
